activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel A Robb

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on December 16, 2022 at 08:00 am.

10:14 AM Defendant Daniel A Robb in court.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe in court for Daniel A Robb.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Reading of Information waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  JT 12/16/22 - Proposed Jury Instructions, Witness Lists, Verdict Forms, any Motions and Notice of Intent to Use Video are to be filed no later than 12/9/22.

9:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel A Robb appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe appeared by video for Daniel A Robb. 

9:02  Court relates and gives appearances.
9:03  Deputy Donald Weise called, sworn, direct by State.  Witness identifies defendant.  
9:09  Cross by Atty. Dobbe.
9:11  Court finds probable cause; bound over.
Arraignment set; must appear in person.
NOH to be sent.
Arraignment scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel A Robb in court.  Attorney Matthew Dobbe in court for Daniel A Robb. 
Formal reading waived of complaint. Time limits are waived. Preliminary hearing set. Parties may appear by zoom video. JA to send NOH with zoom information.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Letter to Judge Babler from Attorney Dobbe regarding 4/27/22 adjourned appearance.

Adjustment Number: 22A 017797,
Payable Number: 126124,
Receipt Number: 22RP000935,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with L.W.

1:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daniel A Robb appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Daniel A Robb for today only.  Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney. Address confirmed and phone number updated.  AIA set and must appear in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
